article_title: América Móvil Signs Network Agreement With Retailer Elektra
article_text:
MEXICO CITY—Mexican telecommunications company América Móvil said Wednesday it signed an agreement with retailer Grupo Elektra under which a unit of Elektra will offer mobile-phone services by leasing space on América Móvil’s network.

It was the second agreement that América Móvil has signed in the past week to lease space on the network of its local wireless unit Telcel, Mexico’s biggest mobile operator with around 70% of the...
